archimate:Node.name: Decision Support/Data Analytics Server (DSD)
archimate:Node.documentation:
Intended Use:
Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Dual Intel Xeon Platinum or AMD EPYC processors (32 cores each) optimized for computational performance. • Memory Capacity: o Minimum 512 GB RAM, expandable to 5 TB (supporting large analytical datasets, advanced machine learning, and complex modeling). • GPU Acceleration: o 2 GPU cards (96gb) (e.g., NVIDIA Tesla A-series GPUs, such as A100 or equivalent) essential for efficient machine learning and AI workloads. • Storage Capacity and Configuration: o High-performance NVMe local storage (8 TB) for rapid data caching and processing. o Additional SAN/NAS storage connectivity for scalable data warehousing. • Network Connectivity: o Quad-port 10GbE minimum, preferably 25GbE or higher for rapid data transfer between analytics servers and data warehouses. • Form Factor: o Rack-mounted (2U–4U) with adequate internal expansion for GPUs and memory. • Redundancy Features: o Redundant power supplies, RAID storage redundancy, redundant network interfaces, hot-swappable components (fans, drives, GPUs where possible). • Power Supply Rating: o Dual redundant power supplies (1600W, 80 PLUS Platinum efficiency rating). • Cooling System: o Enhanced cooling system with redundant, high-performance hot-swappable fans to manage GPU and CPU heat loads. • Virtualization Support: o VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V, Linux-based hypervisor certified for analytics workloads. • Operating System Compatibility: o Windows Server 2022 (with support for analytics platforms) o Linux-based servers (RHEL, Ubuntu, CentOS) optimized for data analytics and AI workloads.
Recommended Accessories and Protection for All Servers:
• Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS): o Rack-mounted UPS system for power outage protection and stable operation. • Server Rack and Cabinet: o Secure, lockable 19-inch standard server rack or cabinet with adequate ventilation and cable management. • Remote Management: o Integrated management module - Dell iDRAC for remote monitoring and maintenance. • Backup and Disaster Recovery: o Cloud or off-site replication o Automated scheduled backups o Comprehensive disaster recovery planning. • Security Features: o TPM 2.0 for encryption o Secure Boot capability o Regular firmware/security patches updates.
